product_name: ICEBUG Heros-L Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The stable women's ICEBUG Heros-L Running Shoes have grippy soles and water-resistant uppers to help keep you on track with your training despite cold, wet weather. Polyurethane and ripstop nylon uppers are water resistant to keep moisture out when you're running on wet and snowy trails. Deep rubber lugs provide good traction on wet roads; also suitable for use on soft surfaces, such as muddy and snowy trails. Grippy rubber outsoles can accept BUGweb traction devices with carbide studs (not included) for upgraded traction on icy and snowy terrain. EVA midsoles and polyurethane shanks support your feet during long training runs. Reflective trim increases your visibility at night. Fully gusseted tongues keep debris out. Closeout.
short_description: The stable women's ICEBUG Heros-L Running Shoes have grippy soles and water-resistant uppers to help keep you on track with your training despite cold, wet weather.
